mapper.update: update user set portrait=#{portrait} where uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: SELECT view.vid,view.category,view.name,view.longitude,view.latitude,view.detail,view.picture FROM user INNER JOIN action INNER JOIN view ON user.uid=action.uid AND view.vid=action.vid WHERE action.uid=#{uid} AND action.aid=#{aid}
select * from view where name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%');
select view.vid,view.name,count(aid) as collect_number from view,action where view.vid=action.vid and action.aid=0 group by action.vid order by collect_number desc
select view.vid,view.name,count(action.aid) as track_number from view,action where view.vid=action.vid and action.aid=1 group by action.vid order by track_number desc
select view.vid,view.name,count(action.aid) as wish_number from view,action where view.vid=action.vid and action.aid=2 group by action.vid order by wish_number desc
select view.vid,view.name,avg(comment.grade) as grade_number from view,comment where view.vid=comment.vid group by view.vid order by grade_number desc
select comment.grade,count(comment.grade) as grade_number from view,comment where view.vid=comment.vid and view.vid=#{vid} group by comment.grade
select user.uid,user.name,comment.grade,comment.detail from comment,user where comment.vid=#{vid} and comment.uid=user.uid
select * from flag where (flag.fid BETWEEN 0 and 4)
select * from flag where (flag.fid BETWEEN 5 and 11)
select * from flag where (flag.fid BETWEEN 12 and 17)
select * from action,view where action.uid=#{uid} and action.vid=view.vid and action.aid=0
select * from action,view where action.uid=#{uid} and action.vid=view.vid and action.aid=1
select * from action,view where action.uid=#{uid} and action.vid=view.vid and action.aid=2
